Trial_Design.evidence: A single-centre phase II study was conducted

Participants.evidence: patients with colorectal peritoneal metastases undergoing CRS-HIPEC

Intervention.evidence: SPECT/computed tomography (CT) was undertaken before surgery, after intravenous administration of 10 mg 111 In-labelled DOTA–labetuzumab-IRDye800CW

Objective.evidence: The aim of this study was to validate these results.

Method_Outcome.evidence: tumour-to-background ratios (TBRs) and peritoneal cancer index scores were analysed.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The mean(standard deviation, s.d.) SPECT/CT peritoneal cancer index score was 3(2), and the intraoperative score was 14(7) ( P = 0.032).

Harms.evidence: No study-related severe adverse events were reported.
